heading: Wednesday Night
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a shower south, and chance north, except likely in the St. Lawrence Valley and Adirondacks, with some summit-level snow showers possible there. Lows from the upper 30s to mid 40s. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly cloudy, except partly cloudy southeast. Showers likely near and north of Route 4, chance to the south; snow showers possible over the northern mountains summits. Valley highs in the mid to upper 50s for southeastern valleys, upper 40s to mid 50s elsewhere. South to southwest winds 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Partly cloudy in southern valleys. Periods of clouds north and in the southern Greens, with the chance of showers, possibly mixing with or changing to snow over the mountain summits. Lows from the mid 30s to around 40, except low to mid 40s near Lake Champlain. Winds becoming west 5 to 10 mph.
